entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH LATE THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
